aboutMe.heyIm: Hey, I'm Raphaela. I'm passionate about the world of coding, with its many opportunities to turn creative ideas into functional code. What especially fascinates me is the logic behind the code: the interaction of individual elements that work together flexibly and structured. Everything follows clear rules, yet there are countless ways to find a solution. Every new challenge is an opportunity for me to develop my skills further and find elegant, efficient solutions.
aboutMe.letsWork: Let's work together and create innovative solutions!

skills.text: I develop dynamic, responsive applications such as games and business software that adapt seamlessly to different devices. By working with APIs and databases, I create interactive and data-driven applications. I have also worked in collaborative teams on several projects, contributing effectively to the development process. My experience ranges from simple static websites to complex, modern web applications.
skills.h4: Don't see the skill you are looking for?
skills.feelFree: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge. Also I have a special interest in learning:

projects.explore: Explore a selection of my work here. - Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
projects.joinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.joinDevelopment: In our project group, I was responsible for, among other things, implementing key UI components: the input form for new tasks, the Kanban board with its individual columns, and the task editing functionality. Additionally, I focused specifically on the structuring and organization of the project.
projects.dABubbleDescription: This App is a Slack Clone App. It enables team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
projects.elPolloLocoDescription: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco bottles to fight against the giant chicken.
projects.elPolloLocoDevelopment: I developed the entire game on my own – from the gameplay mechanics and level design to the enemy logic. I particularly focused on creating a smooth player experience, with one key element being a custom camera system, among other factors.

references.h2: What my colleagues say about me
references.textMartens: Raphaela is a fantastic team player. She consistently approached our group work with a positive attitude and a strong sense of collaboration. Her keen eye for detail was a significant asset to our projects, ensuring that our work was polished and precise. Beyond her technical skills, Raphaela has a natural ability to create a supportive and productive work environment. I am certain that she will be a great addition to any team.
references.textNeußer: Working with Raphaela was characterized by mutual respect and constructive collaboration. I especially appreciated her structured approach, which helped me reflect on and improve my own way of working. Her feedback was clear, helpful, and always at eye level – a real asset to the project.

contact.getInTouch: Then get in touch and tell me how I can support you. With structure, clarity, and a way of working that harmoniously connects technology and team, I develop solutions that have a lasting impact.

responsible.title: 1. Responsible Party
responsible.text1: The person responsible for data processing on this website is:

general.title: 2. General Information on Data Processing
general.text1: I take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Personal data is treated confidentially and in accordance with legal data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

hosting.title: 3. Hosting with ALL-INKL.COM
hosting.text2: . When you visit the website, data that your browser transmits is automatically collected. This includes:

data.datetime: Date and time of the request
data.lang: Language and version of the browser software

hosting.text3: The processing is carried out to ensure the security and stability of the website (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR). A data processing agreement pursuant to Art. 28 GDPR has been concluded with the hosting provider.

contact.title: 4. Contact Form
contact.text1: If you send me inquiries via the contact form, your details, including the contact information you provide, will be stored for processing the inquiry.
contact.text2: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (processing for the performance of pre-contractual measures).

disclosure.title: 5. Disclosure of Data
disclosure.text1: Your personal data will only be transmitted to third parties if:
disclosure.point1: You have given your explicit consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR),
disclosure.point2: the disclosure is necessary to fulfill a contract (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR), or
disclosure.point3: there is a legitimate interest and no overriding legitimate interests exist (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR).

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.text1: You have the right at any time to:
rights.complaint: Complaint to a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR).

ssl.title: 7. SSL/TLS Encryption
ssl.text1: This website uses SSL or TLS encryption to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as when using the contact form. You can recognize an encrypted connection by “https://” in your browser’s address bar.
